document_data.name: Agrak
document_data.mainbody: Lord '''Agrak''' ({{Pronounce|AG|rak|refs={{Cite adventurers league/Quelling the Horde|26}}}}) was a [[cambion]] [[goblin]] lord and chief servant of [[Graz'zt]] in the [[Moonsea]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Quelling the Horde|5,26}}
document_data.Description: Agrak's goblin body was lean and tall in shape, with six fingers on each hand. Emblematic of his descent from Graz'zt, his skin was black as [[obsidian]] and his head bore a crown of horns.
document_data.Activities: He typically relaxed in his room together with his [[carrion crawler]] mount [[Vellicatus]].
document_data.Personality: Agrak had all the megalomania, hedonism, and madness of his forebears. He had shaped his clan like the court of Graz'zt.
document_data.Relationship: Agrak was an old friend of the [[incubus]] [[Mardivec Gentlecut]].{{Cite adventurers league/Quelling the Horde|16}} He was a direct descendant of Graz'zt, being born from a cambion offspring of Graz'zt and a goblin chieftain.
